title: dirty-tricks.pdf
description:
You know how it works: you spend hours trying to find a workaround for a problem that you have encountered, just to realize that it doesnâ€™t quite work in, you know, that browser. Finding little techniques and tricks to help you get to results faster can immensely improve your productivity, so you donâ€™t have to waste time on solutions that will never see the light of day.

I love finding those little useful front-end goodies that make our lives easier. Since technologies emerge and evolve permanently, keeping track on whatâ€™s going on is often difficult, especially since specifications change and so does the browser support. For a replacement talk at SmashingConf Oxford last week, Iâ€™ve decided to collect some of the useful techniques from various articles, conversations and my workshops in a slide deck â€” and since it proved to be useful for many front-end developers Iâ€™ve spoken to after the talk, Iâ€™m very privileged to share it with the entire community as well
